report.name: facconsr

dataSource.name: Q_FACCONSR
dataSource.select:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- Query Etat FACCONSR -- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT soc.soclib dc_soclib, fac.numfact dc_numfact, fac.typfact dc_typfact, fac.datfact dc_datfact, fac.faccsec dc_faccsec, fac.fnumasn dc_fnumasn, fac.fregcompta dc_fregcompta, fac.fenvsec dc_fenvsec, fac.fmodreglt dc_fmodreglt, fac.fsocfour dc_fsocfour, fac.fcoduser dc_fcoduser, fac.fmontht dc_fmontht, fac.fmontttc dc_fmontttc, fac.llibanalyt dc_llibanalyt, fac.fmoiacompta dc_fmoiacompta, fac.fstatut1 dc_fstatut1, fac.fstatut2 dc_fstatut2, fac.fprovsdff1 dc_fprovsdff1, fac.fprovsdff2 dc_fprovsdff2, fac.fprovsegl1 dc_fprovsegl1, fac.fprovsegl2 dc_fprovsegl2, lig.lnum dc_lnum, fac.fdeppole dc_fdeppole, lig.lmoisprest dc_lmoisprest, lig.lmontht dc_lmontht, lig.tva dc_tva, lig.lcodcompta dc_lcodcompta, fac.numcont dc_numcont , decode(c.top30,'N',substr(fac.cav,2,2),'O',decode(fac.cav,'000',null,fac.cav)) dc_cav, lig.pid dc_pid, lig.ident dc_ident, lig.lprest dc_lprest, fac.fenrcompta dc_fenrcompta, fac.fordrecheq dc_fordrecheq, fac.fnom dc_fnom, fac.fadresse1 dc_fadresse1, fac.fadresse2 dc_fadresse2, fac.fadresse3 dc_fadresse3, fac.fcodepost dc_fcodepost, fac.fburdistr dc_fburdistr, ca.clibrca dc_libca, ca2.codcamo dc_libca2, ca3.codcamo dc_libca3, c.siren FROM ligne_fact lig, facture fac, societe soc, struct_info st, centre_activite ca, contrat c, struct_info st2, centre_activite ca2, struct_info st3, centre_activite ca3
WHERE fac.socfact = lig.socfact(+) and fac.numfact = lig.numfact(+) and fac.typfact = lig.typfact(+) and fac.datfact = lig.datfact(+) and fac.socfact = soc.soccode and fac.fdeppole = st.codsg and st.centractiv = ca.codcamo
and c.numcont=fac.numcont and c.soccont=fac.soccont and c.cav=fac.cav
and c.codsg=st2.codsg and st2.centractiv=ca2.codcamo and lig.ldeppole=st3.codsg and st3.centractiv=ca3.codcamo
&P_WHERE
ORDER BY lig.lnum

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( c.top30 , 'N' , substr ( fac.cav , 2 , 2 ) , 'O' , decode ( fac.cav , '000' , null , fac.cav ) )

function.name: afterpform

cf_cfraisformattrigger

lmontant_ht
